verses.verse: The whole earth <WH776> was of one <WH259> language <WH8193> and of one <WH259> speech. <WH1697>
It happened, <WH5265> as they traveled east, <WH6924> that they found <WH4672> a plain <WH1237> in the land <WH776> of Shinar, <WH8152> and they lived there. <WH3427>

They said <WH559> one <WH376> to <WH3051> another, <WH7453> "Come, <WH3051> let <WH3835>'s make bricks, <WH3843> and burn <WH8313> them thoroughly. <WH8316>" They had brick <WH3843> for stone, <WH68> and they used tar <WH2564> for mortar. <WH2563>

They said, <WH559> "Come, <WH3051> let <WH1129>'s build ourselves a city, <WH5892> and a tower <WH4026> whose top <WH7218> reaches to the sky, <WH8064> and let <WH6213>'s make ourselves a name, <WH8034> lest we be scattered abroad <WH6327> on the surface <WH6440> of the whole earth. <WH776>"
Yahweh <WH3068> came down <WH3381> to see <WH7200> the city <WH5892> and the tower, <WH4026> which the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> built. <WH1129>

Yahweh <WH3068> said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH259> they are one people, <WH5971> and they have all one <WH259> language, <WH8193> and this is what they begin <WH2490> to do. <WH6213> Now nothing <WH3808> will be withheld <WH1219> from them, <WH2161> which they intend to do. <WH6213>
Come, <WH3051> let <WH3381>'s go down, and there confuse <WH1101> their language, <WH8193> that <WH834> they may not understand <WH8085> one <WH376> another <WH7453>'s speech. <WH8193>"
So Yahweh <WH3068> scattered them abroad <WH6327> from there <WH8033> on the surface <WH6440> of all the earth. <WH776> They stopped <WH2308> building <WH1129> the city. <WH5892>

Therefore its <WH8034> name was called <WH7121> Babel, <WH894> because there Yahweh <WH3068> confused <WH1101> the language <WH8193> of all the earth. <WH776> From there, <WH3068> Yahweh scattered <WH6327> them abroad <WH6327> on the surface <WH6440> of all the earth. <WH776>

This is the history of the generations <WH8435> of Shem. <WH8035> Shem <WH8035> was one hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and became the father <WH3205> of Arpachshad <WH775> two years <WH8141> after <WH310> the flood. <WH3999>

Shem <WH8035> lived <WH2421> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Arpachshad, <WH775> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Arpachshad <WH775> lived <WH2425> thirty <WH7970>- five <WH2568> years <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Shelah. <WH7974>

Arpachshad <WH775> lived <WH2421> four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Shelah, <WH7974> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Shelah <WH7974> lived <WH2425> thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Eber: <WH5677>

and Shelah <WH7974> lived <WH2421> four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Eber, <WH5677> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Eber <WH5677> lived <WH2421> thirty <WH7970>- four <WH702> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Peleg. <WH6389>

Eber <WH5677> lived <WH2421> four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Peleg, <WH6389> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Peleg <WH6389> lived <WH2421> thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Reu. <WH7466>

Peleg <WH6389> lived <WH2421> two hundred <WH3967> nine <WH8672> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Reu, <WH7466> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Reu <WH7466> lived <WH2421> thirty <WH7970>- two <WH8147> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Serug. <WH8286>

Reu <WH7466> lived <WH2421> two hundred <WH3967> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Serug, <WH8286> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Serug <WH8286> lived <WH2421> thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Nahor. <WH5152>

Serug <WH8286> lived <WH2421> two hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Nahor, <WH5152> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Nahor <WH5152> lived <WH2421> twenty <WH6242>- nine <WH8672> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Terah. <WH8646>

Nahor <WH5152> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> nineteen <WH6240> years <WH8141> after <WH310> he became the father <WH3205> of Terah, <WH8646> and became the father <WH3205> of sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Terah <WH8646> lived <WH2421> seventy <WH7657> years, <WH8141> and became the father <WH3205> of Abram, <WH87> Nahor, <WH5152> and Haran. <WH2039>

Now this is the history of the generations <WH8435> of Terah. <WH8646> Terah <WH8646> became the father <WH3205> of Abram, <WH87> Nahor, <WH5152> and Haran. <WH2039> Haran <WH2039> became the father <WH3205> of Lot. <WH3876>
Haran <WH2039> died <WH4191> before <WH6440> his father <WH1> Terah <WH8646> in the land <WH776> of his birth, <WH4138> in Ur <WH218> of the Chaldees. <WH3778>

Abram <WH87> and Nahor <WH5152> took <WH3947> wives. <WH802> The name <WH8034> of Abram <WH87>'s wife <WH802> was Sarai, <WH8297> and the name <WH8034> of Nahor <WH5152>'s wife, <WH802> Milcah, <WH4435> the daughter <WH1323> of Haran <WH2039> who was also the father <WH1> of Iscah. <WH3252>
Sarai <WH8297> was barren. <WH6135> She had no child. <WH2056>

Terah <WH8646> took <WH3947> Abram <WH87> his son, <WH1121> Lot <WH3876> the son <WH1121> of Haran, <WH2039> his son <WH1121>'s son, <WH1121> and Sarai <WH8297> his daughter-in <WH3618>-law, his son <WH1121> Abram <WH87>'s wife. <WH802> They went <WH3318> from Ur <WH218> of the Chaldees, <WH3778> to go <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667> They came <WH935> to Haran <WH2771> and lived there. <WH3427>
The days <WH3117> of Terah <WH8646> were two hundred <WH3967> five <WH2568> years. <WH8141> Terah <WH8646> died <WH4191> in Haran. <WH2771>
